title: Update Puro avatar to match Changed (DragonSnow)

requirements.summary: Replace the Puro avatar asset with an updated image matching Puro from Changed and wire it into the PuroAvatar component.
acceptanceCriteria: A new or updated Puro avatar image asset exists under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The PuroAvatar component displays the updated asset and still renders correctly at all supported sizes (sm/md/lg/xl).
No user-facing text references anything other than “Puro” (English only).

file_operations.description: Add the updated Puro avatar image (edited from frontend/public/assets/generated/puro-avatar.dim_512x512.png) that visually matches Puro from Changed (DragonSnow), with a clean background suitable for circular cropping.

Update the avatar image reference to use frontend/public/assets/generated/puro-avatar-changed.dim_512x512.png while keeping the existing size variants (sm/md/lg/xl), circular crop, and alt text exactly "Puro".
